plot: Documenting a construction site, the director finds commitment and continuity of a kind that was missing in the family he came from.
title: Habayit Berechov Tabenkin
plot_es: Documenting a construction site, the director finds commitment and continuity of a kind that was missing in the family he came from.
plot_en: Documenting a construction site, the director finds commitment and continuity of a kind that was missing in the family he came from.
